title: Smart Crutch - Base Model (Affordable Utility)
description: A reliable and affordable smart crutch with essential support features. Includes weight sensor with height optimization, PPG heart rate monitoring, fall detection, shock absorber, and integrated headlight & tail light for safe movement.

title: Smart Crutch - Mid Model (Smart & Useful)
description: An advanced smart crutch featuring dual-chamber LED, auto-light using LDR, a 1.9-inch non-touch display, and three tactile navigation buttons. Displays real-time vitals and posture monitoring for enhanced rehabilitation.

title: Smart Crutch - Top Model (Premium)
description: Premium flagship variant with a 2.8-inch touchscreen, soft-touch cushioning, foldable mini-chair, and kinetic charger generator. Features advanced UI dashboards and high-performance dual-chamber LED for professional & field use.

specifications.targetUsers: High-end medical devices, defense, field workers, premium customers

title: Smart Crutch - Custom Model (Flexible Configuration)
description: Customizable smart crutch variant where users can select any combination of features from all models. Fully tailored design for personal, medical, or organizational needs.

customizationOptions: Choose features from Base, Mid, or Premium models
specifications.targetUsers: Clinics, organizations, users needing personalized smart mobility aids

title: Crutch Feet Cap Rubber
description: Durable anti-slip rubber crutch feet cap designed to improve stability and reduce impact shocks. Provides strong floor grip for safe indoor and outdoor use.

title: ESP32 Module with USB Cable
description: High-performance ESP32 microcontroller with integrated WiFi & Bluetooth. Includes USB cable for programming—ideal for smart crutch electronics or IoT upgrades.

title: Forearm Crutch Bag (Small)
description: Compact storage pouch for forearm crutches. Ideal for holding keys, phone, wallet, or medication. Simple strap attachment for convenience.

title: Forearm Crutch Bag (Large)
description: Large multi-pocket forearm crutch storage bag. Ideal for carrying personal essentials during mobility. Strong Velcro straps for secure mounting.

title: Crutch Cuff Bundle
description: Comfortable crutch cuff set designed for forearm crutches. Provides improved grip, arm support, and stability during walking.

title: Forearm Crutch Pad
description: Soft, ergonomic padding for forearm crutches. Reduces pressure on arms and improves comfort over long walking durations.

title: Waterproof Crutch Covers
description: Durable waterproof covers to protect your crutches from rain, snow, and moisture. Easy slip-on design with secure straps.

title: Designer Fashion Crutches
description: Stylish crutches with customizable skins and patterns. Express yourself while staying mobile. Multiple design options available.

title: Medical Grade Underarm Crutches
description: Hospital-quality underarm crutches with anti-microbial coating. Designed for clinical use with enhanced durability and hygiene features.

title: Arthritis-Friendly Ergonomic Crutches
description: Specially designed for users with arthritis or joint pain. Features extra-soft grips, ergonomic angles, and reduced pressure points.

title: Ultra-Compact Travel Crutches
description: Smallest folding crutches on the market. Fits in carry-on luggage. Perfect for frequent travelers who need reliable mobility support.

title: Crutch Storage Bag
description: Premium carrying bag for crutch storage and transport. Multiple pockets for accessories, adjustable shoulder strap, water-resistant material.

specifications.compatibility: Fits most crutches up to 60 inches

title: Shock-Absorbing Crutch Tips
description: Advanced shock-absorbing tips that reduce impact by up to 40%. Extends crutch life and reduces arm fatigue. Set of 2.

title: Pediatric Crutches with Fun Designs
description: Colorful crutches designed specifically for younger children. Features cartoon characters, adjustable height, and safety padding.

title: Professional Athlete Crutches
description: High-performance crutches used by professional athletes. Carbon fiber construction, maximum energy return, and precision engineering.

title: Comfort Grip Handle Covers
description: Soft memory foam handle covers that reduce hand fatigue and prevent blisters. Machine washable, fits most crutch handles.

title: Orthopedic Gel Heel Cushion Inserts
description: Premium gel heel cushions that provide superior shock absorption and pain relief. Ideal for plantar fasciitis, heel spurs, and general foot fatigue.

title: Arch Support Compression Socks
description: Therapeutic compression socks with built-in arch support. Reduces swelling, improves circulation, and provides all-day comfort for foot and ankle pain.

title: Bunion Corrector and Pain Relief Kit
description: Complete bunion care kit with corrector splints, toe separators, and gel cushions. Provides non-surgical bunion correction and immediate pain relief.

title: Plantar Fasciitis Night Splint
description: Adjustable dorsiflexion night splint that gently stretches the plantar fascia while you sleep. Clinically proven to reduce morning heel pain.

title: Memory Foam Orthotic Insoles
description: Full-length memory foam insoles with arch support and heel cup. Provides superior cushioning and proper foot alignment for all-day comfort.

title: Toe Separator and Straightener Set
description: Soft silicone toe spacers that realign toes, reduce friction, and relieve pain from bunions, hammertoes, and overlapping toes.

title: Electric Foot Massager with Heat
description: Professional foot massager with kneading, rolling, and heat therapy. Features multiple intensity levels and targeted pressure points for ultimate relaxation.

title: Diabetic Neuropathy Socks - 3 Pack
description: Seamless diabetic socks with non-binding top and extra padding. Moisture-wicking fabric prevents blisters and promotes healthy circulation.

title: Metatarsal Pads and Ball of Foot Cushions
description: Gel metatarsal pads that redistribute pressure and relieve pain in the ball of the foot. Perfect for high heels, standing all day, or Morton's neuroma.

title: Ankle Support Brace with Compression
description: Adjustable ankle brace with compression straps. Provides stability and pain relief for sprains, arthritis, and post-injury recovery.

title: Callus Remover Electric Foot File
description: Professional electric foot file with diamond crystals. Safely removes calluses, dead skin, and rough patches. USB rechargeable with 3 speed settings.

title: Heel Protector Cushion for Bed Sores
description: Medical-grade heel protectors that prevent and heal pressure sores. Ideal for bedridden patients, post-surgery recovery, and elderly care.

title: Copper Compression Foot Sleeves
description: Copper-infused compression sleeves for arch support and plantar fasciitis relief. Provides targeted compression without restricting toe movement.

title: Toenail Fungus Treatment Cream
description: Advanced antifungal cream with tea tree oil and undecylenic acid. Treats toenail fungus, athlete's foot, and prevents recurrence.

title: Acupressure Foot Massage Mat
description: Therapeutic acupressure mat with thousands of pressure points. Stimulates circulation, relieves stress, and reduces foot pain naturally.

title: Cracked Heel Repair Cream
description: Intensive moisturizing cream with urea and shea butter. Heals severely cracked heels and rough skin. Visible results in 3-5 days.

title: Hammertoe Correction Pads
description: Soft gel cushions that straighten hammertoes and relieve pain. Prevents corns, blisters, and toe friction. Can be worn with any shoes.

title: Foot Spa Bath Massager with Bubbles
description: Heated foot spa with bubble massage, vibration, and infrared therapy. Includes massage rollers and pumice stone for complete foot care.

title: Blister Prevention Tape for Athletes
description: Medical-grade adhesive tape that prevents blisters during sports and long walks. Water-resistant, breathable, and stays in place all day.

title: Orthopedic Sandals with Arch Support
description: Ergonomic recovery sandals with contoured footbed and arch support. Perfect for post-surgery, plantar fasciitis, and all-day comfort.
